Dimensions Archer
 
Description:
Fires several arrows in rapid succession. The archer can aim while using this skill but can not move.
 
Stats:
Required Level: 11
Range: Weapon Range * 0.75
Shot Count: 4 + (Skill Rank / 2)
Damage: Weapon Damage * (0.25 + (0.05 * Skill Rank))
Damage Type: Weapon Damage Type
Speed: Weapon Speed * 0.9
Recovery: Weapon Recovery
